Package de.ailis.usb4java.topology

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    UsbPorts<P extends javax.usb.UsbPort,D extends javax.usb.UsbDevice>
    A list of USB ports.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Usb4JavaConfiguration
    usb4java implementation of JSR-80 UsbConfiguration.
    Usb4JavaDevice
    usb4java implementation of JSR-80 UsbDevice.
    Usb4JavaEndpoint
    usb4java implementation of UsbEndpoint.
    Usb4JavaHub
    usb4java implementation of JSR-80 UsbHub.
    Usb4JavaInterface
    usb4java implementation of UsbInterface.
    Usb4JavaNonHub
    usb4java implementation of JSR-80 UsbDevice.
    Usb4JavaPipe
    usb4java implementation of UsbPipe.
    Usb4JavaPort
    usb4java implementation of UsbPort.
    Usb4JavaPorts
    A list of USB ports.
    UsbDeviceScanner
    USB Device scanner.
    VirtualRootHub
    The virtual USB root hub.
    VirtualRootHubConfiguration
    Virtual USB configuration used by the virtual USB root hub.
    VirtualRootHubInterface
    The virtual USB interfaces used by the virtual USB root hub.
